## RoseParams.foregroundType property

Gauge foreground type - default: `steelseries.ForegroundType.TYPE1`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
foregroundType?: ss.ForegroundType;
```

## Remarks

ignored if [foregroundVisible](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.foregroundvisible.md) = `false`
